title: I finally did it!

embed.description: Facechecking the brush is dangerous, and so is facechecking the web. Other websites may not be as well-warded as ours, so please use your best judgement when clicking on unknown links.

body:
I served my penance in bronze, I spent my time in silver, I paid the price of gold and I climbed to the top of platinum. 

it's all lead up to this moment.

7 years & 5 ranks.

replies.body: Nice job man, any words of wisdom you have for us low elo scrubs you've left behind?

sorry for the late reply, Try to play champions that can hyper carry really, you're not gonna get carried too often and you're not going to have a team do decent, pick up a champion who can survive a fight with the 7/2 darius

no problem man, sorry for my late reply ;)

Thanks for the advice, I really appreciate it
But next season you theorycraft alloys and discover the joy of iron. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
